tags.name: service-worker
tags.description: Custom Element for declaratively adding a service worker with optional auto-update.

attributes.name: auto-reload
attributes.description:
If true, when updates are found, the page will automatically
reload, so long as the user has not yet interacted with it.

attributes.name: update-action
attributes.description:
String passed to serviceWorker which triggers self.skipWaiting().
String will be passed in message.action.

attributes.name: error
attributes.description: Error state of the service-worker registration

attributes.name: path
attributes.description: Path to the service worker script.

properties.name: autoReload
properties.description:
If true, when updates are found, the page will automatically
reload, so long as the user has not yet interacted with it.

properties.name: updateAction
properties.description:
String passed to serviceWorker which triggers self.skipWaiting().
String will be passed in message.action.

properties.name: error
properties.description: Error state of the service-worker registration

properties.name: path
properties.description: Path to the service worker script.

properties.name: worker
properties.description: A reference to the service worker instance.
